content:
IDynamicValidatorException Interface

Definition

Represents an interface implemented by Dynamic Data Exception classes.

In this Article

public interface IDynamicValidatorException

Properties

InnerExceptions

Gets the exceptions that occur when a new or edited data field is validated.

public System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,Exception> InnerExceptions { get; }
Value
IDictionary<String,Exception>

A collection that contains all the exceptions that occurred.
